questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: My best memory of a holiday was San Torini. The sun was shining and the lanscape were beautiful. San Torini is an island in West Greece. There ares many white en little houses. the guide tells us the was in fact hotel today. she also tells us why these houses are whites, it's to keep cold air iside. there were also many orthodoxe chrurch. there were white with a blauw hood.
